Name: White Wishes
ActivityDesc:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.40

[Event Info]:
1. During the event, the [White Wishes] event mission will be available for a limited time.
2. Participate in the story with other Gray Ravens for an unexpected journey!

Name: Disco Panini
ActivityDesc:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.52

[Event Info]:
1. During this event, 10 songs will be released over the course of the event with 2 difficulties for you to challenge upon release.
2. While a stage is in progress, watch for notes to change and follow the melody's prompt to complete the designated action.
3. Upon completing the event, you can receive the rare collectible [Spin This Disco Ball] and the new decor set [Knight Pavilion].
4. Let's dance together in this joyful ocean of music!

Name: Spectroscopic Binary Star
ActivityDesc:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.52

 [Event Info]:
1. This is a single-player mode that allows you to deploy two characters to the battlefield to fight the enemy.
2. Use Reinforcement Skills in battle to let the other character trigger Matrix and attack the enemy.
3. Each class has 2 unique reinforcement effects. Use them wisely based on the mechanic you have selected.
4. The event consists of 5 chapters. The first 3 chapters are of normal difficulty. Clear them and you will win most of the rewards. The 4th chapter, however, grants a tougher challenge.

Name: Extremis Collaboration
ActivityDesc:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.40

[Event Info]:
1. In this mode, there are solo stages and team stages. You are recommended to try solo stages before proceeding to team stages.
2. In solo stages, you can familiarize yourself with the mechanics. After which, you can clear the 3-star requirements to obtain materials and enhance talents.
3. In team stages, a boss will shuttle between team members every 30s. Members not facing the boss will have to deal with the mechanics same as the solo stage while providing support for the other members.
4. While in a team stage, maintain the Fever status to kill the boss quickly and receive a high score.
5. A new theme will be released each week. The most outstanding commandants will receive a limited nameplate from Babylonia.

Name: Operation Uniframe
ActivityDesc:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.52

Event Info:
1. This event has 2 phases that are independent of each other.
2. Each phase consists of 3 Combat Areas and 1 Central Area.
3. Clearing the stages in a Combat Area increase its Energy Supply Level.
4. Each Area grants additional points to the Central Area based on its Energy Supply Level.
5. Resident Shop added. Exchange items in the shop for rewards.
6. Difficulty selection added. Higher difficulties grant better rewards. You can select a difficulty 1 time each session.

Name: Cat Grab
ActivityDesc:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.40

Event Info:
1. You can obtain 10 [Lucky Chests] daily from story main stages, resource stages, and Event - Cosmic Glow.
2. Open [Lucky Chests] to share Cogs with members. Collect Cogs to unlock members. Member will grant different effect bonuses in the Cat Grab.
3. Keep capturing resources in the space, accumulate Resource Points, purchase consumable add-ons, and upgrade the UFO. May you have abundant Resource Points and a happy day!

Name: Fortune of Tiger
ActivityDesc:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.40.

Event Info:
1. During the event, the event mission [Fortune of Tiger] will be available for a limited time.
2. The first clear of each stage will grant a 1st Clear Reward!
3. Let's have fun together, Commandants!

Name: Fortune's Favor
ActivityDesc: Event Info:\n1. Log in every day to claim [Fortune Pouches] and use them to draw rewards in the [Lucky Draw] event. You can also use Black Cards or Rainbow Cards to exchange for Fortune Pouches.\n2. Complete various R&D Tickets and "Fortune" total consumption goals to earn ["Fortune"]. Use "Fortune" to exchange for amazing rewards including Bianca: Veritas Special Effect Coating [Spring Huntress] in the [Fortune Merchant] shop.

Name: Rosa Tryst
ActivityDesc:
[Requirements]: Commandant Lv. 40

 [Event Info]:
1. You can participate in the special event of Venus Splash Park with Constructs on such special day during the Golden Age
2. You can keep company with more Constructs by activating sites and completing events
3. You can participate in the event to collect event items and obtain rewards after completing tasks
4. After completing the event with each Construct, you will unlock specific communications

Name: Weirdlands Adventure
ActivityDesc:
[Requirements]: Commandant Lv 40

 [Event Info]: 
1. During the event, the event instance of [Weirlands Adventure] will open for a limited time; Let's experience the amazing adventure at the Babylonia with Nanami!
2. You will obtain abundant of training and enhancing materials as rewards if you clear the instance of [Weirdlands Adventure] for the first time

Name: Energy Detector
ActivityDesc:
Event Details:
1. Complete the event missions to obtain Cell Batteries EX (event tokens). 
2. There are two types of missions. [Daily missions] will refresh daily, but each [Cumulative missions] only can be completed once.
3. Use Cell Batteries EX to activate the Detector to scan through the area. You will be rewarded Detect Points for each detect.
4. After achieving the required Detect Points, you can claim corresponding rewards including serum,
brand new dorm decoration and other gifts.

Name: Azure Apocalypse
ActivityDesc:
New Coating:
Omniframe [Lucia: Crimson Abyss] New Special Effect Coating: [Azure Apocalypse]

1. During this event, [Azure Apocalypse] can be obtained in
"Research - Secret Pact" for a limited time.
2. [Azure Apocalypse] is guaranteed in 10 pulls.
3. After the event, the corresponding coating will be taken off the shelf.
